questions.question: 1. What is an important goal when marketing your game?

options.option: Getting to know your target audience
Getting feedback for a future game idea

questions.hint: Hint: Try watching the video for a recap!

questions.question: 2. What does QA in games stand for?
questions.hint: Hint: Why not check out the BAFTA YGD game Glossary?

questions.question: What is the role of a community manager in games?

options.option: To feedback player responses to the development team in order to improve the game further
To boost morale when players donâ€™t win in game
To play the game to find bugs and glitches

questions.question: Why is it important to get people to test your game before you release it?

options.option: To identify any potential bugs or glitches that need to be fixed
To get feedback from your potential target audience
